attributes.action: Instate the widows pension for second wives of deceased British Army  personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I paid into a widows pension fund whilst serving in the British Army.  Indeed I paid extra in order to secure a half-pension rate.  Whilst serving in the Falkland Islands my wife met someone else and when I got back to UK we were divorced.  My new wife is not entitled to any of the widows pension for which I have paid. Neither am I entitled to have any of my payments returned to me. I request that the widows pension be instated in such circumstances.
